about_the_game:
Step into the world of street racing with Urban Shadows Racing™ Tokyo! In this thrilling racing experience, you’ll compete on the neon-lit streets of Tokyo, striving to become the true champion. The city becomes your playground, with tight corners, long straightaways, and challenging tracks that will test your reflexes and control.

In Urban Shadows Racing™ Tokyo, gameplay focuses on intense races where you must compete against other drivers to be the first to complete laps and reach the finish line. The game offers a wide selection of powerful, fully customizable cars, each with its own strengths and weaknesses. You can adjust your car’s settings, from engine power to handling, aerodynamics, and tire grip, to better match the specific challenges of each track.

As you progress, you’ll unlock new cars, upgrade parts, and explore new tracks throughout Tokyo. The game’s realistic physics engine makes every drift, every turn, and every acceleration feel true to life. Mastering drifting through tight corners is key to maintaining speed and gaining an edge over your competitors.
detailed_description:
Step into the world of street racing with Urban Shadows Racing™ Tokyo! In this thrilling racing experience, you’ll compete on the neon-lit streets of Tokyo, striving to become the true champion. The city becomes your playground, with tight corners, long straightaways, and challenging tracks that will test your reflexes and control.

In Urban Shadows Racing™ Tokyo, gameplay focuses on intense races where you must compete against other drivers to be the first to complete laps and reach the finish line. The game offers a wide selection of powerful, fully customizable cars, each with its own strengths and weaknesses. You can adjust your car’s settings, from engine power to handling, aerodynamics, and tire grip, to better match the specific challenges of each track.

As you progress, you’ll unlock new cars, upgrade parts, and explore new tracks throughout Tokyo. The game’s realistic physics engine makes every drift, every turn, and every acceleration feel true to life. Mastering drifting through tight corners is key to maintaining speed and gaining an edge over your competitors.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows 10
  • Processor: Ryzen 5500
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RX470
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Urban Shadows Racing™ Tokyo - intense races on the neon-lit streets of Tokyo. Compete against other racers, upgrade your cars, and prove you’re the best on the track.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Simplified Chinese*, Korean*, Polish*, Russian*, Turkish*, Japanese*
*languages with full audio support
